column4: how can I select custom settings for compiz in appearance? I installed compizconfig-settings-manager, but the option doesn't appear.
it should show up under system -> preferences somewhere
CompizConfig does appear under system > preferences, but that's not my question, i want to be able to select "custom" in system > preferences > appearance > visual effects.
hmm, don't know, then. i don't even run compiz. :) maybe someone else can point you true.
